==== Ubuntu Women Team ====

* During <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-washington/1110/detail/|OSCON]]</nowiki> Valorie Zimmerman and Linda Halligan worked at the Ubuntu booth along with the Oregon LoCo. Ubuntu Women cards, flyers and stickers were all popular.
* During the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuCommunityWeek|Ubuntu Community Week]]</nowiki> presentations were given by Charlene Tessier, Elizabeth Krumbach, Cheri Francis Ansbergs and Laura Czajkowski
* Team meeting <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings/20110714|July 14th]]</nowiki>
* Launched <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/LeadershipElectionProcess/2011|election process for leadership trio]]</nowiki>
** July 7: <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2011-July/003298.html|Nomination Phase Begins]]</nowiki>
** July 21: <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2011-July/003309.html|Testimonial Phase Begins]]</nowiki>
** Nominees for leadership: Elizabeth Krumbach, Cheri Francis, Jessica Ledbetter, Valorie Zimmerman
* Expanded social media presence
** Facebook page: <nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/ubuntuwomen]]</nowiki>
** Ident.ca account: <nowiki>[[http://identi.ca/ubuntuwomen]]</nowiki>
* Launched blog: <nowiki>[[http://blog.ubuntu-women.org/]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://fullcirclemagazine.org/issue-51/|Full Circle Magazine, Issue #51]]</nowiki> with interview about UDS with Cheri Francis
* Of the 675 Ubuntu Members at the end of this month 4.74% are women
